# Earth's Surface Processes

## Essential Question

> How do internal and surface processes work together to shape Earth's landscapes?

## Tectonic Plate Motion and Earthquake Activity

Earth's internal processes drive plate tectonics, which shape our planet's surface. This interactive map shows real-time tectonic plate motion and recent earthquake activity, demonstrating how internal forces continuously reshape Earth's surface.
